description: It's a lazy fall Sunday, which, if you are Cody Cummings, means football and relaxation. Watching the day's slate of games with intent and focus, Cody all of a sudden finds himself distracted by the growing situation in his shorts. Luckily for Cody, no officials are around to whistle him for illegal use of the hands, so Cody indulges himself in a few personal drills to keep up his hand/eye coordination. And if his stiffening cock is any indicator, then it is safe to say that Cody is a veteran of this type of sport. Spreading his legs and really opening up the playbook, Cody is going for the big score before the games end. Enjoy!
title: HALFTIME HARD ON
